nodes.label: message
nodes.text: Hi,  So my dad will be heading down soon for his treatment but I wanted to mention a few things. My brother Person1 will be bringing him today. He has been off prednisone completely for one week. Swelling in his legs started again yesterday. The rash has been almost non -existent and itching under control with gabapentin as long as we out the cream on everyday. He has had absolutely no energy over the past week and chest congestion. Saw pulmonologist Person2 and he said probably rebound from stopping prednisone and he should use his Albuterol inhaler. Very interested to see how his labs are today. Should we restart prednisone 2.5 or 5mg? Person1 will call me when you meet with my dad. Thank you, Person3  XXX-XXX-XXXX
